TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class DbTransaction : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable, System.Data.IDbTransaction
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DbTransaction extends System.MarshalByRefObject implements class System.Data.IDbTransaction, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: The base class for a transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Commit() cil managed

Docs.summary: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection"> object associated with the transaction.
Docs.value: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection"> object associated with the transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A single application may have multiple data source connections, each with zero or more transactions. This property allows you to determine the connection object associated with a particular transaction.

Docs.summary: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection"> object associated with the transaction.
Docs.value: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection"> object associated with the transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A single application may have multiple data source connections, each with zero or more transactions. This property allows you to determine the connection object associated with a particular transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction">.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> should rollback the transaction. However, the behavior of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> is provider specific, and should not replace calling <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Rollback%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

Docs.param: If `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction"> references.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction"> and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> should rollback the transaction. However, the behavior of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> is provider specific, and should not replace calling <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Rollback%2A>.

Docs.summary: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel"> for this transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Rollback() cil managed

Docs.summary: Rolls back a transaction from a pending state.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection"> object associated with the transaction, or a null reference if the transaction is no longer valid.
Docs.value: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection"> object associated with the transaction.
